item.title: FBI thwarts 'potential terrorist attack' in Michigan
item.description: The FBI has thwarted "a potential terrorist attack" and arrested "multiple subjects" in Michigan, according to FBI Director Kash Patel.

item.title: WATCH: Devastating aftermath of Hurricane Melissa in Jamaica
item.description: Entire communities have been devastated or isolated after taking a direct hit form the powerful storm.

item.title: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing after plane loses altitude, passengers injured
item.description: A JetBlue flight made an emergency landing after experiencing a drop in altitude, leaving several passengers injured, according to the airline.

item.title: What the US-China deal means for rare earths, soybean farmers and TikTok
item.description: The world's two largest economies appeared to dial back a monthslong trade war.

item.title: WATCH: Police officer caught without pants during video court hearing
item.description: A Detroit police officer was caught during a court appearance with his pants down â€” literally.
